trans-unit.source: Customizing Business Central | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Customizing Business Central | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn about adding functionality and customizing Business Central.

seg-source.mrk: Learn about adding functionality and customizing Business Central.

target.mrk: Naučte se o přidávání funkcí a přizpůsobení aplikace Business Central.

trans-unit.source: Customizing Business Central

seg-source.mrk: Customizing Business Central

trans-unit.source: There are different ways to customize the application to give you and your colleagues access to the features, functionality, and data that you need most, in a manner that bests suits your daily work.

seg-source.mrk: There are different ways to customize the application to give you and your colleagues access to the features, functionality, and data that you need most, in a manner that bests suits your daily work.

target.mrk: Existují různé způsoby, jak přizpůsobit aplikaci tak, aby vám a vašim kolegům umožnila přístup k vlastnostem, funkcím a datům, které potřebujete nejvíce, a to způsobem, který nejlépe vyhovuje vaší každodenní práci.

trans-unit.source: Those who see the changes will depend on what you do, as described in this table.

seg-source.mrk: Those who see the changes will depend on what you do, as described in this table.

target.mrk: Ti, kteří vidí změny, budou záviset na vašich akcích, jak popisuje tato tabulka.

trans-unit.source: In addition to what administrators can customize, users can personalize their pages by adding, moving, or removing fields, freeze panes, parts, and more.

seg-source.mrk: In addition to what administrators can customize, users can personalize their pages by adding, moving, or removing fields, freeze panes, parts, and more.

target.mrk: Kromě toho, co mohou přizpůsobit administrátoři, mohou uživatelé přizpůsobit své stránky přidáním, přesunem nebo odebráním polí, ukotvením podoken, dílů a dalších.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Personalizing Your Workspace](ui-personalization-user.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Personalizing Your Workspace](ui-personalization-user.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Přizpůsobení pracovního prostoru](ui-personalization-user.md).

trans-unit.source: What you can do

seg-source.mrk: What you can do

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Who sees the changes

seg-source.mrk: Who sees the changes

trans-unit.source: More information

seg-source.mrk: More information

trans-unit.source: Install an extension

seg-source.mrk: Install an extension

trans-unit.source: Extensions are like small applications that add functionality, change behavior, provide access to new online services, and more.

seg-source.mrk: Extensions are like small applications that add functionality, change behavior, provide access to new online services, and more.

target.mrk: Rozšíření jsou jako malé aplikace, které přidávají funkce, mění chování, poskytují přístup k novým online službám a další.

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft provides an extension that provides integration with PayPal Payments Standard.

seg-source.mrk: For example, Microsoft provides an extension that provides integration with PayPal Payments Standard.

target.mrk: Společnost Microsoft například poskytuje rozšíření, které zajišťuje integraci s PayPal Payments Standard.

trans-unit.source: All users in all companies.

seg-source.mrk: All users in all companies.

trans-unit.source: [Customizing Using Extensions](ui-extensions.md)

seg-source.mrk: Customizing Using Extensions

trans-unit.source: Change which UI elements are visible.

seg-source.mrk: Change which UI elements are visible.

target.mrk: Změňte, které prvky uživatelského rozhraní jsou viditelné.

trans-unit.source: The **Experience** setting determines how much of the functionality is displayed in the user interface.

seg-source.mrk: The **Experience** setting determines how much of the functionality is displayed in the user interface.

target.mrk: Nastavení **Experience** určuje, kolik funkcí se zobrazí v uživatelském rozhraní.

trans-unit.source: Choose between Essential and Premium.

seg-source.mrk: Choose between Essential and Premium.

target.mrk: Vyberte si mezi Essential a Premium.

trans-unit.source: All users in a specific company.

seg-source.mrk: All users in a specific company.

trans-unit.source: [Changing Which Features are Displayed](ui-experiences.md)

seg-source.mrk: Changing Which Features are Displayed

trans-unit.source: Manage users' personalizations.

seg-source.mrk: Manage users' personalizations.

trans-unit.source: Control and manage users' personalization by disabling the ability to personalize pages and clearing any page personalizations.

seg-source.mrk: Control and manage users' personalization by disabling the ability to personalize pages and clearing any page personalizations.

target.mrk: Ovládejte a spravujte uživatelská přizpůsobení tím, že deaktivujete možnost přizpůsobení stránek a vymažete všechna přizpůsobení stránek.

trans-unit.source: All users in a specific company.

seg-source.mrk: All users in a specific company.

trans-unit.source: [Managing Personalization as an Administrator](ui-personalization-manage.md)

seg-source.mrk: Managing Personalization as an Administrator

trans-unit.source: Enable colors on Role Centers to signal importance.

seg-source.mrk: Enable colors on Role Centers to signal importance.

target.mrk: Pro signalizace důležitosti povolte barvy v centru rolí.

trans-unit.source: Set up Cues that appear on users' Role Centers to include an indicator that changes color based on the values in the Cues.

seg-source.mrk: Set up Cues that appear on users' Role Centers to include an indicator that changes color based on the values in the Cues.

target.mrk: Nastavte hromádky, které se objevují v uživatelských Centrech rolí tak, aby obsahovaly indikátor, který mění barvu na základě hodnot v hromádkách.

trans-unit.source: All users in a specific company.

seg-source.mrk: All users in a specific company.

trans-unit.source: [Setting Up a Colored Indicator on Cues](admin-how-set-up-colored-indicator-on-cues.md)

seg-source.mrk: Setting Up a Colored Indicator on Cues

trans-unit.source: All feature descriptions in user documentation for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] assume the **Premium** experience, meaning the descriptions cover the full scope of UI elements.

seg-source.mrk: All feature descriptions in user documentation for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] assume the **Premium** experience, meaning the descriptions cover the full scope of UI elements.

target.mrk: Všechny popisy funkcí v uživatelské dokumentaci [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] předpokládají **Premium** experience, což znamená, že popisy pokrývají celý rozsah prvků uživatelského rozhraní.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, users with the **Essential** experience may in some topics read about functionality and UI elements that are not visible in their user interface.

seg-source.mrk: Therefore, users with the **Essential** experience may in some topics read about functionality and UI elements that are not visible in their user interface.

target.mrk: Uživatelé s **Essential** experience proto mohou v některých tématech číst o funkcích a prvcích uživatelského rozhraní, které nejsou viditelné v jejich uživatelském rozhraní.
